item.title: GooseLang - Custom Programming Language
item.description: Over the past month, I’ve been working on creating my own programming language, GooseLang. It has nothing to do with geese - just has all the things I love about Python, C, Java etc compiled into one!

item.title: Multi-threaded Web Server
item.description: Background [[Fundamentals of C]] [[Socket Programming]] Idea: Not to reinvent the wheel but to learn more about the wheel HTTP is just text, a protocol for browsers to send and receive information from servers.
